channel.title: PI (Need help) Hybridpvp base i think :P
channel.description: Im using PI server, (original hybridpvp/torvapkz/teamtorva yeah yeah yeah thing) and the problem i have that when player wears an helmet such as rock-shell helm, there appears a glitch that the head/hair comes out of the helmet, looks like the helmet is more down that it should be. So yeah, heres pictures, the glitched and non glitched. Please help quickly :S (This wont happen with all helmets but most does) Unglitched -> http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/580/glitchdt.png/ Glitched -> http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/830/glitch2w.png/

item.title: PI (Need help) Hybridpvp base i think :P
item.dc:creator: @xShrawenx xShrawenx
item.description:
@xShrawenx wrote:

So could you or someone else uhh… well… ‘‘spoon feed’’ me. I have just started with coding and haven’t done anything with models. Could you help me fix this? Would really appreciate.
